name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WebSync full site importer for NotebookLM

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to add pages or complete websites to NotebookLM

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly import pages or entire websites into your NotebookLM workspace with just two clicks. 
Perfect for researchers, students, and professionals who want to save time and avoid the hassle of manually crawling websites, this extension streamlines data collection for smarter organization and analysis.

New:
- Add support for importing YouTube videos and playlists
- Add support for importing Lists of URLs (from file)

Previous releases:
- Add option to add only a single page
- Persist settings
- Add a feedback form link
- Improved responsiveness when stop crawling is clicked
- fix login api change
